subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The larger, speedier Anaheim Ducks defeated the Rangers with the help of rookie goaltender Frederik Andersen and two first-period goals from Corey Perry and Kyle Palmieri.
snippet: The larger, speedier Anaheim Ducks defeated the Rangers with the help of rookie goaltender Frederik Andersen and two first-period goals from Corey Perry and Kyle Palmieri.
